title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Ironically, recalling the past is often an effective way to process your present and future. Staying busy with current demands not only can prompt you to lose touch with your ambitions but your previous travails, too. You might not like to dwell on bygone days but feeling them intimately can distill an understanding that you need now. It is vital to learn from your personal history to avoid making fresh mistakes, especially when the cosmos offers a perfect opportunity for healing. Marcel Proust wrote, Memory nourishes the heart, and grief abates. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
